snippet: The English papers are devoting special attention to the gross mismanagement of the English Railways. Several accidents have occurred, and several lives have been sacrificed. The causes of these accidents have been sought with the utmost care and ...
lead_paragraph: The English papers are devoting special attention to the gross mismanagement of the English Railways. Several accidents have occurred, and several lives have been sacrificed. The causes of these accidents have been sought with the utmost care and perseverance.
